title: Delhi Raises Minimum Wages: Significant Increases for Skilled and Unskilled Workers
summary: The Delhi government has announced substantial increases to minimum wages, with unskilled workers now entitled to Rs 18,456 and skilled workers to receive Rs 22,411 per month. This wage revision aims to address cost of living increases and ensure fair compensation for workers in the national capital.
content:
##Wage Policy Update

The Delhi government has implemented a significant hike in minimum wages across worker categories. Under the new wage structure, unskilled workers will receive Rs 18,456 per month, while skilled workers' minimum wages have been set at Rs 22,411.

This revision represents the government's effort to ensure workers can maintain adequate living standards in the face of rising costs in the national capital region. The new wages will be mandatory for all employers operating within Delhi's jurisdiction.
